articles.title: Venice Lineup Interview: Festival Chief Alberto Barbera Says ‘Joker 2’ Is “One Of The Most Daring Films In Recent American Cinema” & Daniel Craig Gives “The Performance Of His Career” In ‘Queer’ - Deadline
articles.description: The Venice lineup promises a host of riches including new films from Pedro Almodovar, Pablo Larrain, Luca Guadagnino and the Joker sequel.
articles.content: The Venice Film Festival, a perennial awards platform, revealed another powerhouse lineup Tuesday morning, including Todd Phillips Joaquin Phoenix-Lady Gaga starrer Joker: Folie à Deux, Pedro Almodóv… [+6817 chars]

articles.title: Cows, dairy workers, and America's struggle to track bird flu - BBC.com
articles.description: Scientists, advocates, and farm workers worry that a lack of testing in the US could allow bird flu to spread undetected.
articles.content:
Madeline Halpert
A US farm worker walks between rows of cows being milked at a California farm.
